name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Gloves of Swimming and Climbing

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, bull's strength, cat's grace

sections.body: These apparently normal lightweight gloves grant a +5 competence bonus on Swim checks and Climb checks. Both gloves must be worn for the magic to be effective.
sections.name: Description
